title: iOS color doesn't fit Android color
body:
Hi,

On iOS 10 Apple uses extended color space that is not supported by SkiaSharp: the colors on a SKSurface are faded/washed-out and doesn't correspond to the expected render. On Android the rendering colors are normal.

On Xamarin Forms this bug is solved in this pull request: https://github.com/xamarin/Xamarin.Forms/pull/1182

Florian.
